title: Jayson Williams Interview and more
itunes:title: Jayson Williams Interview and more
description:
Wednesday 9/6- Today on the show we had former NBA player Jayson Williams stop by where he spoke about the shooting of his limo driver, dealing with addiction and more. Also, Charlamagne decided to give "Donkey of the Day to Jason Whitlock and Fox Sports 1 because thye keeps attacking Colin Kaepernick. Also, Anglea helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
